entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 12:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
